channel.title: 667 dumped and packed bonuses!
channel.description:
[url=http://uppit.com/141v4qgzl4sk/bonuses.zip]Download bonuses.zip @ UppIT[/url] these are the bonuses from runewiki as of 4/25
now to pack them delete the "bonuses.ib" file and make a file called bonuspacker.bat and put this in it [CODE]@echo off title ITEMS "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* com.rs.tools.ItemBonusesPacker pause[/CODE]

item.title: 667 dumped and packed bonuses!
item.dc:creator: @xxlovedxx xxlovedxx
item.description:
@xxlovedxx wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:5, topic:440669”][quote author=xxlovedxx link=topic=543346.msg3983534#msg3983534 date=1335583952]
OK this is driving me insane. I finally found a tutorial on how to do this, and i follow all the steps then run the packer and i keep getting this error:

Exception in thread “main” java.io.FileNotFoundException: data\items\bonuses (Ac
cess is denied)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at com.rs.tools.ItemBonusesPacker.main(ItemBonusesPacker.java:17)
Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]
Are you using Linux or Mac?[/quote]
No, I’m using a PC i don’t get it i think there is a problem with my item bonus packer -.-

Read full topic

item.title: 667 dumped and packed bonuses!
item.dc:creator: @DylanRyan DylanRyan
item.description:
@DylanRyan wrote:

  1. Goto your source
  2. Goto data>items
  3. Delete file “bonuses.ib”
  4. Download file above
  5. Extract File from above
  6. Place the folder “bonus”(From the download) in your source(data>items)
  7. Run item packet.bat
  8. Enjoy!

Read full topic
